titleInfo.title: USA v. Hoier, et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting 435 Motion to Amend the Conditions of Supervised Release as to Thomas E. Craig (4). Condition 6 of the Defendant's supervised release is amended to require 40 hours of community service. Ordered by Judge Laurie Smith Camp.(JSF)
